original_text: For it was so, when Jezebel cut off the prophets of the Lord, that Obadiah took an hundred prophets, and hid them by fifty in a cave, and fed them with bread and water.)
korean_text: 이세벨이 여호와의 선지자들을 멸할 때에 오바댜가 선지자 백 명을 가지고 오십 명씩 굴에 숨기고 떡과 물을 먹였더라

sentences.original_text: For it was so, when Jezebel cut off prophets of the Lord
that Obadiah took an hundred prophets
and hid them by fifty in a cave
and fed them with bread and water
